amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that the Secretary of the Interior enters into candidate conservation agreements with each of the relevant 11 Western States before the United States Fish and Wildlife Service makes a listing determination on the greater sage-grouse under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 452 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 452 proposed by Senator Heller. (consideration: CR S1875-1877; text: CR S1875) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that the Secretary of the Interior enters into candidate conservation agreements with each of the relevant 11 Western States before the United States Fish and Wildlife Service makes a listing determination on the greater sage-grouse under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 452 proposed by Senator Heller.
